definition: the act of entering, put into a trance
details:
noun
- the act of entering
= example: the act of entering
= synonyms: incoming, entering, entry, ingress, entree
- something that provides access (to get in or get out)
= example: something that provides access (to get in or get out)
= synonyms: entry, entree, entranceway, entryway
- a movement into or inward
= synonyms: entering
verb
- put into a trance
= synonyms: spellbind
- attract
= synonyms: capture, catch, charm, trance, enchant, enamour, becharm, enamor, captivate, beguile, fascinate
